stories.Title: SREday in London
stories.Description: Calling all SRE enthusiasts! SREday hits London on September 14-15, featuring a mind-blowing lineup of over 50+ talks. Act quick! Early bird tickets are still available.
stories.Tweet: SREday in London 📦 Calling all SRE enthusiasts! SREday hits London on September 14-15, featuring a mind-blowing lineup of over 50+ talks. Act quick! Early bird tickets are still available. #SRE https://sreday.com/?unpack

stories.Title: An upcoming revolution in physics
stories.Description: Fermilab is challenging conventional wisdom with its "g-2" experiment, showing that muons aren't behaving according to the rules we once thought, hinting at the existence of a potential fifth force.
stories.Tweet: An upcoming revolution in physics 📦 Fermilab is challenging conventional wisdom with its "g-2" experiment, showing that muons aren't behaving according to the rules we once thought, hinting at the existence of a potential fifth force. #science https://www.bbc.com/news/science-environment-66407099

stories.Title: Cancer-fighting bacteria
stories.Description: In the quest for earlier cancer detection, scientists introduce CATCH, a method that employs engineered bacteria to uncover concealed malignancies in challenging areas.
stories.Tweet: Cancer-fighting bacteria 📦 In the quest for earlier cancer detection, scientists introduce CATCH, a method that employs engineered bacteria to uncover concealed malignancies in challenging areas. #science https://www.engadget.com/scientists-genetically-engineer-bacteria-to-detect-cancer-cells-114511365.html

stories.Title: Meet the morning star: Earendel
stories.Description: NASA's James Webb Space Telescope collaborates with Hubble, introducing us to Earendel, the most distant star ever detected. Exposing its colors and the potential presence of a companion.
stories.Tweet: Meet the morning star: Earendel 📦 NASA's James Webb Space Telescope collaborates with Hubble, introducing us to Earendel, the most distant star ever detected. Exposing its colors and the potential presence of a companion. #NASA https://gizmodo.com/webb-telescope-image-most-distant-star-company-1850726205

stories.Title: Crafting tomorrow's medicine
stories.Description: LabGenius redefines antibody engineering with an AI-driven approach. The fusion of technology and science could lead to treatments that are not just effective, but transformative.
stories.Tweet: Crafting tomorrow's medicine 📦 LabGenius redefines antibody engineering with an AI-driven approach. stories.Title: Customizable conversations
stories.Description: ChatGPT's custom instructions are now rolling out to all users, including the free tier. This feature enables them to craft interactions with the chatbot according to their specific preferences.

stories.Title: Prompting 101
stories.Description: Crafting prompts for AI interactions is an art that requires patience. Check out this comprehensive guide to ensure that you ask the right questions for unlocking ChatGPT's most insightful answers.

stories.Title: Hop on the Bandwagon
stories.Description: SpaceX's Falcon 9 rocket is set to embark on its next chapter with the upcoming "Bandwagon" rideshare missions. A strategic response to customers eyeing mid-inclination orbits.
stories.Tweet: Hop on the Bandwagon 📦 SpaceX's Falcon 9 rocket is set to embark on its next chapter with the upcoming "Bandwagon" rideshare missions. A strategic response to customers eyeing mid-inclination orbits. #spacex https://spacenews.com/spacex-to-offer-mid-inclination-smallsat-rideshare-launches/

stories.Title: Interstellar Technologies gets into orbit
stories.Description: The Zero rocket is preparing for its first orbital mission. Fueled by liquid methane and committed to sustainability, it aims to offer cost-effective and flexible launches.
stories.Tweet: Interstellar Technologies gets into orbit 📦 The Zero rocket is preparing for its first orbital mission. Fueled by liquid methane and committed to sustainability, it aims to offer cost-effective and flexible launches. #rocketscience https://interestingengineering.com/innovation/interstellar-tech-plans-testing-of-zero-rocket

stories.Title: Welcome home STEREO-A!
stories.Description: After 17 years in the cosmos, NASA's STEREO-A spacecraft returns for an Earth flyby on Aug. 12. Providing scientists with an unprecedented chance to unveil the mysteries of our nearest star, the Sun.
stories.Tweet: Welcome home STEREO-A! 📦 After 17 years in the cosmos, NASA's STEREO-A spacecraft returns for an Earth flyby on Aug. 12. Providing scientists with an unprecedented chance to unveil the mysteries of our nearest star, the Sun. #NASA https://www.nasa.gov/feature/goddard/2023/sun/after-seventeen-years-a-spacecraft-makes-its-first-visit-home

stories.Title: A mind of its own
stories.Description: Elon Musk makes an intriguing revelation by stating that Tesla vehicles possess some kind of "mind." This announcement aligns with Musk's indication of advancements in certain AGI aspects.
stories.Tweet: A mind of its own 📦 Elon Musk makes an intriguing revelation by stating that Tesla vehicles possess some kind of "mind." This announcement aligns with Musk's indication of advancements in certain AGI aspects. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/08/11/elon-musk-tesla-cars-mind-figured-out-some-aspects-agi/

title: Fermilab's quest for the fifth force, SpaceX introduces Bandwagon missions, Teslas have minds?
description: Chicago might become the hub for physics, as scientists believe they're on the verge of discovering a new force of nature. SpaceX's rideshare missions are reaching mid-inclination orbits, inviting customers to quite literally "hop" on the Bandwagon (yes, that's the actual name). And as usual, a post from Tesla's CEO on the former bird app, now known as X, leaves us in shock: Teslas do have some sort of “mind.” However, they won't be outsmarting us anytime soon.
